articles.content:
Comedian Chris Rock may be hosting next year's Oscars in a triumphant return after he was smacked in the face by Best Winning Actor Will Smith.

articles.title: Neil Patrick Harris Is Sorry About That Charcuterie Plate - The Cut
articles.description: The actor apologized for serving a cured-meat display designed to look like “the corpse of Amy Winehouse” at a 2011 Halloween party.
articles.content: Last week, photos of a jaw-droppingly insensitive meat platter resurfaced on Twitter. If this is the first youre hearing of it, the charcuterie plate in question was labeled the corpse of Amy Winehou… [+1497 chars]
